Articles.Content:
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Wga5A6R9BJg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
  
My mind is now infected with this song, and it keep playing in my head over and over again...  
I am losing control, it is taking over me, making me sharing this, so that it can infect new minds. And now I have exposed you all to it...  
I am sorry. I am so sorry...

What have you done, OP?! You have doomed us all!

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I have somehow managed to block out the song and concentrate on the video only... I lost it at the technoviking dance.
I've always loved this song, and the video. first time I saw it and I recognized the technoviking was so great. had a great laugh at that.

I use this one to overwrite other songs that do that. Of course, now you're in a "When you give a mouse a cookie..." situation. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TTI4Qt8sbw4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And here is this other song that completely controlled me and the world.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/moSFlvxnbgk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Right now, I feel the same way, doomed.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-13T00:35:40Z" title="04/13/2015 12:35  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 13, 2015</time> by CelticCossack51**
